info.name: Festivo Event Platform API
info.description: Complete API collection for Festivo Event Platform - an event marketplace connecting organizers with service providers.

request.description: Check API health status including database connections
Get new access token using refresh token

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Birthday Bash 2024",
  "description": "An amazing birthday celebration with music, food, and fun activities!",
  "eventType": "birthday",
  "date": "2024-12-25",
  "time": "18:00",
  "locationName": "The Grand Ballroom",
  "address": "123 Party Street, Mumbai",
  "city": "Mumbai",
  "location": {
    "type": "Point",
    "coordinates": [72.8777, 19.0760]
  },
  "expectedGuests": 50,
  "budget": 100000,
  "isPublic": true,
  "tags": ["birthday", "party", "celebration"]
}

request.description: Get all public events with filters
Get events organized by current user
Search events with text and filters

body.raw:
{
  "serviceName": "Premium Catering Services",
  "category": "food",
  "description": "We provide premium catering services for all types of events. Our menu includes Indian, Chinese, and Continental cuisines.",
  "basePrice": 500,
  "priceUnit": "per_person",
  "city": "Mumbai",
  "serviceAreas": ["Mumbai", "Thane", "Navi Mumbai"],
  "location": {
    "type": "Point",
    "coordinates": [72.8777, 19.0760]
  },
  "tags": ["catering", "food", "premium"]
}

request.description: Get services created by current user
Search services with text and filters

body.raw:
{
  "event": "{{eventId}}",
  "service": "{{serviceId}}",
  "eventDate": "2024-12-25",
  "priceAgreed": 25000,
  "notes": "Please prepare vegetarian food for 50 guests",
  "requirements": "No onion, no garlic"
}

request.description: Get all bookings for current user
Get all bookings for an event

body.raw:
{
  "event": "{{eventId}}",
  "taskName": "Book DJ",
  "description": "Find and book a DJ for the party",
  "category": "music",
  "priority": "high",
  "dueDate": "2024-12-20",
  "budgetAllocated": 15000
}
